description.value: Choose a Psychic Phenomena (other than perils of the Warp). Can substitute any result you roll on Psychic Pnenomena except Perils of the Warp with this effect. Mutually exclusive with Warp Affinity, cannot have both Talents

system.benefit: Choose a Psychic Phenomena (other than perils of the Warp). Can substitute any result you roll on Psychic Pnenomena except Perils of the Warp with this effect. Mutually exclusive with Warp Affinity, cannot have both Talents

specialAbilities.name: Sanctioned
specialAbilities.description: You are a sanctioned psyker. You subtract 10 from all Psychic Phenomena rolls.
